locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: If your looking for a nice place to take a free Hot shower this place is it. Large showers, free soap, towels, and clean. 10 out of 10 recommend.
Satisfied with the cleanliness of my shower. I'm not asking for perfection. I just need to be comfortable enough to shower and get out. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ ask for extra towels the workers need to think that they be a husband and wife and kid that needs to shower to that drives 18wheeler  and and when did they start charging  truckers for refills  on there drinks they charger me and ‚Ä¶
Great hot shower w/no wait.. HIGH pressure.. way better food selection than Love's.

Shower #2 has high pressure, is spacious for proper hadicap, no chair to sit, large enough to have three adults comfortable, and has a shower wand (use extreme caution with wand pressure on jet setting). Staff said there "should" be a ‚Ä¶
Huge shower rooms, very clean and sanitized! If this location had hair dryers, it would be the best hands down!
all drives before taking shower here please check the floor first they did not clean floor properly floor was very dirty
Nice Shower Room, I will definitely come back here.

Passed through this area a couple days ago.
Very pleasant staff, shower was very clean.
Laundry facilities with clean machines.

Parking was a non issue, I didn't stay overnight.

Woman driver ~ I kid you not, I‚Äôm in my shower and drying off about to put on my clothes and some man that works there with keys just walks in. I‚Äôm beyond furious, he didn‚Äôt knock or anything just walks in. Claiming my shower said vacant ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: First visit to this particular location.  Great place!  Love the gas price.  We ate there, Chester's Chicken.  Yum!  Clean and stocked.  Restrooms very clean.  All the employees were friendly and helpful.  In fact, my coffee cup lid was not ‚Ä¶
Really small, shower was ok clean and I had no problem finding a spot. Its really convenient because there is a small Walmart right next to it

The average gas station with average cleanliness: satisfactory road trip break.
Plus, I liked that they had bag buddies of Sanrio characters as popsicles lol.

Not the cleanest Loves I've been too. The Subway employees just seem to be robotic not spacing the ingredients on the sandwich. And seemed kinda skimpy on the meat. The bread was kinda rubbery which was weird because it was toasted. ‚Ä¶
A clean love‚Äôs, good food, clean shower, truck parking is limited and fresh coffee ‚òïÔ∏è
Wide selection of items for snacks and drinks. Bathrooms are well maintained and clean. Service is fast and friendly. This is a great place to stop.
Good truck stop. Parking is tight and limited. Walmart next door for extra parking and groceries if needed. Thanks for the clean shower and the coffee!

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ just ask someone to watch them and they're happy to help, food, snacks, drinks, free truck parking in the back, shower available, diesel, accepts most credit cards, you can order hunts brothers pizza also available by the hunk, 100% gas no ‚Ä¶

Usually empty parking lot of gravel and asphalt. Shower is $7. Coffee is .60. Diesel is .30-.40 cheaper than the mega truckstops at the other end of time. Didn't shower or try the food but had a nice 10 here.

showerReviews.reviewText: Showers and laundry were a bit pricey, $17 for a shower and $6 per load of laundry. Otherwise not a bad place, it was clean and the prices on fuel were competitive. If you're just looking for a good shower I would recommend the Choctaw ‚Ä¶
Good water hole to take a shower n stock up on food ! Cheap fuel price using mudflap platform !
Excellent stop to get off the road for a minute or two, fuel, food or a shower.
Hot, clean shower. Hot pizza. Good price on diesel.

locations.content: Pilot Dealer may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: The showers were phenomenal. Loved the space the area of the shower needs to be maybe 6 inches wider for the curtains it caused the floor to flood we wiped it up no big deal. Huge shower room only other thing I'd add is a table or shelf to ‚Ä¶

Cleanliness is something most truck stops disregard. This Pilot is the cleanest Truck Stop I've ever visited. Shower rooms cost $12. They are tiled, very clean & spacious. No rust or scum on fixtures. It also has plenty of parking.
üèÖüèÜüéñ ‚Ä¶

The nicest truck stop shower I have had to date. They accept pilot points for showers. Good food ( a little expensive, but it's a truck stop). Only downside is the angled truck parking. Some people don't know how to back and that just helps ‚Ä¶
When were I go there. There showers are not working. Today I had to w8 more than 3 hours for the shower. I don't know why pilot doing business with them if they don't have a shower.
Waited forever for a shower.   Only 2 are operable.   It's normally a pleasant experience though.   This is a 1st.

Ok First.... You CAN USE YOUR PILOT POINT FOR SHOWERS!! You cant reserve a shower on the Pilot App, but can pay for one once you're inside. The showers are so beautiful and clean. The Store smells so good and the Customer Service was good ‚Ä¶
Super clean place. Good BBQ. They overcharge for frozen drinks. A large icee will set you back over $5. They are marketed as a Pilot yet they do not take Pilot point nor shower credits.
Food choices are amazing,  but the shower was disappointing.  Low water pressure and the shower head faces the width, not the length. Poor design.
Walked in to get a shower and was told no shower due to they don't clean showers on 3rd shift. 3rd shift is the job to have here lol.
Go in to take a shower and was told they didn't have one available till after 6 because they were not cleaned and that was after the cleaning lady came in

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ see the potential in the future. Good spacing for parking, granted it‚Äôs still under construction and the store fronts have yet to be filled but still has all you need from shower, restrooms and a store. Now one thing is the stalls in ‚Ä¶

Stopped in for a shower and a meal. So nice here, the staff is super friendly, very nice new showers. Had delicious catfish for lunch and met the Boss himself. Will stop here as often as I can. Support this Truckstop!
‚Ä¶ But, I was let down by the quality of the showers. I tried the standard shower and my husband tried the premium shower. ‚Ä¶

all time favourite truck stop
very well maintained and outstanding service
all staff members are nice and friendly.
restroom and shower are luxury. 10 out of 10.
also provide free truck wash for first time and free parking.

‚Ä¶ parked on the south end by an rv park? The shower area is semi close to that, but the food court is clear on the other side of the complex, and a complex is the best way to describe this, it‚Äôs huge. So it‚Äôs a pretty good trek to the ‚Äúfood ‚Ä¶

Recommend this place to all of our fellow truckers out there if you are nearby because it has plenty of parking, shower, food court and all the amenities for us and also soon they are going to be open other good stuff for our convenience. N ‚Ä¶

Been passing by for months, but not anymore. Everyone from in lady at the in gate kiosk to the store, the shower lady etc were polite and kind and walked me through everything. Great truck parking. Great wifi. Thanks to y'all and I'll see ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ I recently stopped by Truckers Paradise and had high expectations based on all the hype‚Äîespecially from the Mutha Trucker guy who promoted the showers. I get it, they‚Äôre still building things out, and I appreciate the staff who fuel up the ‚Ä¶
More truck stops need a shower w/ a heated towel rack.  Especially in places with cold winters. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ feel. Feels more like a resort minus the ocean/pool. Paid for a premium shower,yes cost a few bucks but it sure was better than a flying j! Met one of the owners Dean very friendly guy,and spent time talking with me. This place ‚Ä¶
